roleset.name: causing death
roleset.note: FATAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from fatal.01-j)

example.name: fatal-j: arg0
example.text: Had two maternal uncles who were diagnosed with colon cancer in the 50 's and two maternal aunts who were diagnosed with cancers -LRB- one aunt had uterine , breast , and colon cancer diagnosed in 50 's , and another aunt had an aggressive malignancy which-1 *-1 was fatal within a month of diagnosis -RRB- .

roleset.name: death from accident or disaster
roleset.note: FATALITY-N NOTES: Added by Julia for earthquakes.

example.name: fatality-n
example.text: The fact that the Tomlinson fatality is such a rarity, only demonstrates how professional a job the police do in protecting life and preserving property.

example.name: fatality-n
example.text: When a traffic fatality is due to reckless driving while under the influence of alcohol or drugs, a manslaughter charge can be warranted
